column4: is there an easy way to get a text login instead of gdm, like changing /etc/inittab runlevel?
is there an easy way to get a text login instead of gdm, like changing /etc/inittab runlevel?
don't you have that choice from the initial login dialog box?  (I use Kubuntu here so not sure, but I get that option)
no there is not that choice. When system boots I would like it to go to multiuser text login
